Rulings.Tengu:
●Paying 1000 Life Points during your Standby Phase is a maintenance cost.
●If your Life Points are 1000 or less during your Standby Phase, you cannot pay for Imprisoned Queen Archfiend so it is destroyed.

Rulings.Base: 1. Paying 1000 Life Points during your Standby Phase is a maintenance cost.\n2. If your Life Points are 1000 or less during your Standby Phase, you cannot pay for "Imprisoned Queen Archfiend" so it is destroyed.
